entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
